articles.title: FIFA's Argentina decision could have key Alejandro Garnacho impact on Manchester United
articles.description: The Under-20 World Cup gets underway in May with Man United youngster Alejandro Garnacho eligible to play for Argentina
articles.content:
Sign up for our daily newsletter to get the day's biggest stories sent direct to your inbox
Argentina has been officially chosen as the host for this year's FIFA Under-20 World Cup in a decision that could have ramifications for Manchester United.

articles.title: Argentina's economy teeters on the edge of deeper crisis as market anxiety grows- Reuters Poll
articles.description: Argentina's economy will teeter on the edge of a deeper crisis in the run up to October's presidential vote as growing market anxiety adds to a harmful mix of drought-induced recession and skyrocketing inflation, a Reuters poll showed.
articles.content:
By Gabriel Burin
BUENOS AIRES (Reuters) - Argentina's economy will teeter on the edge of a deeper crisis in the run up to October's presidential vote as growing market anxiety adds to a harmful mix of drought-induced recession and skyrocketing inflat... [3002 chars]

articles.title: Argentinian Taxi Radio Appears on NASA's Spacewalk Broadcast
articles.description: The ISS was flying over Argentina at the time of the incident, leading some people to believe the interference was in fact a taxi driver from the country.
articles.content:
Leer en español.
“150 Irigoyen, you said?” The innocent question made by an apparent taxi driver has become a sensation in Argentina after the driver’s taxi radio interfered with the signal from the International Space Station and popped up live duri... [3306 chars]

articles.title: Argentina Central Bank Lifts Rate to 81% as Inflation Jumps
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- Argentina’s central bank increased its benchmark interest rate by 300 basis points Thursday after annual inflation soared in March and foreign currency reserves slumped.
articles.content:
The key Leliq rate rose to 81%, one of the highest monetary policy rates in the world, according to a central bank statement. Reuters reported the move earlier.
Argentina also posted a $1.1 billion trade deficit in March, the widest in nearly five ye... [1526 chars]
